content: अविनय {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [न. ब.] Immodest, insolent, ill-behaved, ill-mannered. --यः {@--1@} Want of good manners or modesty; बहवोऽविनयान्नष्टा राजानः सपरिच्छदाः <ls>Ms. 7. 40</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 7.">41.</ls> {@--2@} Rude behaviour, rudeness, immodest or rude act; °बहुलतया चाभिनवयौवनस्य <ls>K. 143</ls>; अयमाचरत्यविनयं मुग्धासु तपस्विकन्यासु <ls>Ś. 1. 25</ls>; indecorum, impropriety of conduct. {@--3@} Incivility, disrespect. {@--4@} Offence, crime, fault. {@--5@} Pride, arrogance, insolence; अविनयमपनय विष्णो <ls>Śaṅkara</ls>.
